creator: chealer@gmail.com
text: In the French version of Configuration Sections (Sections de configuration, on http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.2/fr/sections.html), the word hosts "hôtes" appears several times with a problem on the "o" ("ô"). The word displays as "hÃ´tes". This looks like an encoding problem but other non-ASCII chars display fine.
